article_html:
10:52

Few sporting contests allow as much margin for error as the IPL - Chennai, for example, are top of the league despite losing a third of a their games. But it’s getting to a point. Those well positioned daren’t lose form, and those poorly positioned - todays’ teams, for example - need to get on with it. The the IPL being the IPL, both are plenty capable of sorting themselves, so this should be a good game.

title: Kings XI Punjab v Mumbai Indians: IPL 2015 – live!
